params.index: index of the extra reward to clear

clearExtraRewards().details: Only Prime multising has the ability to do this if you want to remove only one token, use `clearExtraReward`

setExtraReward(address).details: Used for any new incentive that is not directly on balancer gauges

params._hook: The address of the reward hook

processStash().notice: Sends all of the extra rewards to the reward contracts

setExtraReward(address).notice: Registers an extra reward token to be handled

tokenCount().notice: Returns the length of the tokenList
